website_summaries.verdict: Though nothing extraordinary, the Nikon Coolpix L610 is a decent entry-level compact camera that shoots slightly above its price.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix L610 has an above-average feature set for its street price, including a backside-illuminated CMOS sensor and 14x zoom, and uses AA batteries for power
cons: Shooting performance, while better than most in this category, is too slow for photos of kids and pets
Battery life is short with alkaline batteries
Flash must be manually popped up and the optical zoom doesn't work while recording video

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple, point-and-shoot to replace my defunct Kodak Easy Share LS443. After reading several reviews of this and another camera, I chose this L610. I've had it for two months now and have used it some and it's all that I wished it to be. Easy to use and takes great pictures of family, outings, kids' sports, etc. Software is a pleasure compared to the old Kodak Easy Share software, which was never easy or intuitive for me. I'm not a professional photographer, just a weekend, picture-taking grandpa and this camera does it for me at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Jar

customer_reviews.title: Nikon finally got it right with mid grade camera
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a coolpix L 100 which is a good camera but could not change ISO settings so you had put in shooting mode with low ISO to get really good pictures from it. But they got it right with the coolpix l610 ISO settings are auto or you can manually change ISO for whatever your needs are. This camera takes 2AA batteries alkaline, lithium, or rechargeable. Only downside is battery not as good as my coolpix l 100 but that did take 4 AA maybe why it had better battery life but still a great camera great pictures. Consumer Electronic City is the seller and they delivered camera fast and everything was as they said thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mesmerize

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 6 months and the still picture quality is great, the video is marginal and unreliable due to battery and SD card capabilities. I use SanDisk Ultra 32 GB and Coolpix rechargeable batteries and still the video time is unreliable and in short "bursts". I have always been wary of the battery cover door because of the apparent pressure on a very flimsy locking mechanism. I dropped the camera from about 2 ft on a carpeted floor and the battery compartment flew open and the locking mechanism was broken. This is the "Achilles Heel" of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hanhurst

customer_reviews.title: Nikon has always been a great product but recently their 'non-professional' consumer products are lacking ...
customer_reviews.text: Nikon has always been a great product but recently their 'non-professional' consumer products are lacking in quality. The zoom lever on this camera stopped functioning a mere few days after my purchase. This was a replacement for the same model I had been using for just over a years time when the battery door latch decided it no longer wanted to stay closed. Poor product quality in this average consumer product line.
customer_reviews.author: Hoot

customer_reviews.title: so so...not quite a point and snap
customer_reviews.text: I miss my old point and snap, as by the time i get this thing focused, the event is usually over. If i have a full minute or more to get camera ready, it does okay. But at sporting events, parties, baby smiles, and graduation, very hard to use, as the 'moment' passes by too quick for the camera to react. However, when taking still shots of adults or older children who sit still, nice pictures are produced. Therefore, i am not quite sold yet on this camera, because of the difficulty point and shooting quicky. I have been using it for 9 months and wish i had a different one now.
customer_reviews.author: sun and water lover

customer_reviews.title: Really good camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like it ,especially at the price. My only complaint really isn't about this camera. I just wish someone would make an inexpensive .digital with a viewfinder. My 5 year old Canon had one but no one has now. Pictures in bright sun just more difficult. Very crisp and good telephoto though. Also Nikon should really add just a little to the price and include lithium batteries as you are going to need them. I am a fan of AA batteries but get lithium. Nice size camera for me as I like to know I have a camera, not a credit card in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen L. Horn

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performer
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a pocket camera to supplement my DSLR & this provides a variety of automatic and manual settings. It gets more use than my more expensive cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Warrior Princess

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use camera
customer_reviews.text: Photo quality is excellent, especially telephoto pictures. Telephotos with other cameras I tried tended to be fuzzy because of a very mild tremor in my hands. This one gives very sharp pictures. Movies are especially good. My only dissatisfactions are with the high price and low magnification (5x). Having a paper instructional manual rather than a CD is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this camera, Refurbished selling by CAMETA CAMERA (I RECOMMEND THIS SELLER GREAT SERVICE), I bought this one to replace an older 5 MP camera, and for the money it is worth, only 69 bucks, point and shot is to easy for begineers like me, the only issue is the battery lasting, I bought a 2700 Mah rechargable batteries and you can take more pictures and I bought 2 spare batteries to carry on mi bag and I have a lot of energy to take a lot of pics
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Escalante

customer_reviews.title: batteries fall out, pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Yikes...the batteries fall out. The battery door will not stay closed/locked so have had to use duct tape to keep the batteries in the camera. I have had several Coolpix cameras. As for photos, this model is a good camera for casual user, to take a few photos of the grandkids, and small enough for a pocket. However, If you take lots of photos, upgrade to another model. The zoom tends to give fuzzy photos and the camera's response time is slow (for zooming, between taking photos, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: PepperT

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but...
customer_reviews.text: A nice enough camera, in that you don't have to mess with settings. On the bad side, it's plastic, and apparently the old time cheap plastic, as after owning it for about four months, the battery compartment cover would not stay closed. Then, a very small piece of plastic broke off and I can't keep the door closed without a rubber band. My conclusion: don't buy a camera made out of plastic if there is something else available.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Krawczyk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: Received for Christmas and finally had a chance to really use it today. Video'd my son's bball game and took 15 pictures. Fantastic! The video is crisp and clear even when zoomed close. The quality exceeds my expectations for a $149 camera. The camera is a little bulky but it's solid. The batteries drain fast but I got 25 min. of video and the batteries still had 1 bar when I shut down, using energizer NiMH rechargeables. Pictures are nice and crisp. Really enjoying the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix L610
customer_reviews.text: This camera is rated five stars because the pictures are very good quality, The camera is not overly complicated like many digital cameras, it can use standard size batteries rather than specialized batteries, the screen is very bright and large. This camera was bought factory refurbished and at a great price. It is a perfect size to carry in a pocket or purse. What more could you want in a Digital Camera????
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R. Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Small, light weight and easy to use. Not a point and shoot, but a point, focus and shoot. Which is good if you're trying to catch something actiony. You can just focus where you think things will hapen focus, (Button half down) and click when the action is there, Pictures are fine, and at the time it was pretty highly rated in Consumer Reports.
customer_reviews.author: chriso

customer_reviews.title: Not as good of camera as my older Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: Not as good of camera as my older Coolpix. Very finicky camera. Doesn't always perform. Takes good video once you figure out the focus. But again, not easy to get to focus correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not great
customer_reviews.text: first of the battery life on this camera is horrible. But if you use lithium batteries they will last a lot longer. the zoom on the camera is fantastic and so is the macro function or close up. I would recommend this camera to anyone seeking a inexpensive digital camera. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Crysania Weese

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Camera
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new Nikon COOLPIX L610 and so far I am thrilled. The red is a candy apple red..beautiful! Only taken a few pictures but look forward to using and exploring all the fine features that I was looking for in a Nikon. Must mention the price was outstanding as I really searched and seached to get the most for my money. Service and delivery was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Video quality is not bad, as long as you don't need more than ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes decent pictures. HOWEVER... I bought it at a sale price from Amazon, and now I know why the price was so appealing. I'm guessing they wanted rid of this product. It devours batteries at lightning speed. Video quality is not bad, as long as you don't need more than maybe 90 seconds of footage. I put two brand new batteries in camera. Shot 8 or 10 ten-second videos at a football game, and the batteries were sucked dry. When I bought this I had hoped to take it on vacation and get some good video. Doesn't look like that's going to happen. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kettlewell

customer_reviews.title: Eats Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but it goes through batteries like crazy. It's hard to believe that a manufacturer would put a product on the market with this big of a flaw/ Consumer Reports had it as a "best buy" and I can't believe that they tested this camera for any length of time or they too would have found this flaw. I have had to replace batteries after each use. Before I purchased I did see some consumer reviews that mentioned this problem. I could never imagined that it would be this bad. Maybe not all cameras of this model have the problem but don't buy this camera unless you are prepared to lug around a 20 pack of AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond D. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Holding my Breath
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my Granddaughter as a Christmas gift. She loved it and everything worked fine. Until, after about 5 weeks the flash quit working. The camera still took pictures, until the flash was needed. I contacted Nikon who told me to return the camera to where I had purchased it. Of course we had the camera long enough to have been past the Amazon return policy date. I contacted Amazon by email and they agreed to exchange the camera and sent me a return shipping label. I had the replacement camera in two days. So far it is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS LOVETT

customer_reviews.title: Pictures out of focus
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera because of the good reviews it had. Unfortunately it does not live up to them. The camera looks nice, is easy to handle and easy to use. The problem is the quality of the images. When taking a view shot the outlines of houses, hills etc are not clearly defined. On close up shots, for example trees or plants, the images are blurred. I have had discussions with Nikon but they say that the camera is taking pictures within specification. I have spent the last four years taking pictures using a blackberry phone and this provided photos better that the nikon. A big disappointment I expected better from Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S. M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend ;-)
customer_reviews.text: I take this camera everywhere. I love it. I have had some issues with batteries running out real fast, but am hoping if I put better batteries in it that will change. I love the close up feature. I bought this to replace a Canon that I also loved, but this has a much better close up feature. Loved them both, but dropped the other...glad to have this as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Pohonui

customer_reviews.title: NIKON COOLPIX L610
customer_reviews.text: Just received this camera ON TIME and AS DESCRIBED. The first photos appear to be much better than our old point & shoot cameras. Downloading included software was easy, the manual and attachments were included, an on-line manual was also available. The price was great as were online reviews we checked! Thanks! dave4lolad 9 September 2013
customer_reviews.author: David F. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix Camera
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and in perfect condition. It is a very nice camera and the pictures turn out sharp and very clear. The colors are bright and vivid, and one of the only downsides is that it is difficult to take motion pictures. Other than that, this camera has many nice features and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix L610 16 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Had this same camera before and it was damaged when I took it out in rain, not waterproof. Really liked the camera and bought another one the same. It is a little slow to focus at times, and at times photos can be blurry. Takes good photos when it is held steady and focused correctly. Does not take multiple photos as fast as I would like but for the price it is good. Not too good for dark or low light situations.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H Dixon Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about battery life. Compared off-brand Alkaline AA batteries (which lasted about 50 exposures) with Sanyo Eneloop 2,000mAh Rechargeable Ni-MH batteries (500+ exposures over three days before recharging again). Battery life great! Pics great for this type of camera (4 stars). Nightime (handheld) Scene mode fantastic. Got great shots at 1100 ISO and 1/8th of a second. No blurring and minimal noise. Very impressed. Great wideangle and enough zoom. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: cinemaniak

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the most amazing one I have ever owned. I have always been into amateur photography and this has it all for a great low price than a lot of other cameras like the rebel. Its also really compact and it fits in most cases that Ive bought for it and had previously. The only cons I have about this camera are: 1. it is very hard to find a neck strap that fits this camera 2. It goes through a LOT of batteries. I recommend buying a battery charger and rechargeable batteries :)
customer_reviews.author: michelle m

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for..
customer_reviews.text: I seen this camera recommended on Tv and finally decided to get it .I take a lot of pictures of nature and grandchildren and felt this camera would be great for me.I've always bought Kodak cameras and wasn't pleased with the quality. What pictures I've taken so far with this camera has been excellent and I'm planning on enjoying using this camera over the Christmas holiday.I was surprised as to how fast I got my camera it came 3 days after ordering it now that's fast
customer_reviews.author: granny too

customer_reviews.title: Old is new ...
customer_reviews.text: Just like my old one that my husband dropped while kayaking! True to his word, if he got my camera wet, he would replace it. Didn't get latest model because it did not feel the same and was bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Vee

customer_reviews.title: A great entry level point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: A great entry level point and shoot camera. Has good zoom qualities plus panarama and macro functions. Like all electronics you first must READ and FOLLOW the instruction manual. The manual is kind of a pain to download and print and it repeats itself. It's best to use Energizer Ultimate Lithium batteries or rechargeable batteries as the alkaline have a very short life span. Once again do READ and FOLLOW the instruction manual to get the most out of this camera. I certainly would recommend this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Camera failed in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Camera failed half way through a 5 week long trip to Peru, less than 2 months after it was purchased. This camera was a Nikon Canada product and Nikon USA refuses to repair it under warranty, I sent it to Nikon Canada who repaired it but they want $112 to send it back to the USA. If you purchase this camera and live outside of Canada beware.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Sonnevil

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. This is the 2nd camera like this I have bought and the battery flap has broke on both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: OK Camera
customer_reviews.text: Originally I really liked this camera. Then we began to notice a too many of our pictures were blurry and unusable. I've determined it seems to happen mostly in low light (or indoors) when the subject moves. Pictures taken outdoors in bright light seem to be fine. I presume the problem is related to the shutter speed but have not yet pursued the problem with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: RayH

customer_reviews.title: 5,000 pictures: Works like new!
customer_reviews.text: I take photos for my carreer. The picture quality is great, it can be set on auto-mode, or you can adjust settings for each picture/environment. It is durable: I have dropped/bumped/abused it and it keeps going. I also appreciate it's small size: it fits in a pocket, unlike the bigger, heavier cameras. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: G-mann

customer_reviews.title: Lens Sticks
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I decided this was a good choice for my son who was leaving on an extended trip. He needed something small and easy to use. After one use with it (before he even left) the camera battery died while the camera was turned on. Now the lens is stuck out and we have to send it in for repairs, no camera for the trip. I liked Nikon before, but this camera is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This camera was great! I ordered it for use at a concert where flash was not allowed, and it took great pics. The 14X zoom was a boon! So easy to transfer photos to my computer, too. Lithium batteries work best. Camera is small enough not to be a burden at a concert.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthann Daniels

customer_reviews.title: The perfect camera for us
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this camera as an upgrade from the one we had. We are very impressed how clear the pictures are. Just for fun, we zoomed in as far as we could and took a picture of the house at the end of our street. It came in perfectly clear. As far as battery life, so far no problems. We purchased Eneloop rechargeable batteries at the same time as the camera. We take a lot of pictures with just having a baby and have not even needed to recharge once.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stambaugh

customer_reviews.title: not rechargable
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this camera I didn't realize it came with regular AA batteries not rechargeable ones, that was disappointing Also it did not come with a memory card either so that was disappointing, it does take really nice photos though
customer_reviews.author: MANG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera produces sharp images, is easy to use, and small enough to fit in my jacket pocket. Very well made. I suggest you buy a battery charger with lithium batteries. I did and battery life is not a problem, as it has been with some of the other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Worded fine for a year, then kaput
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a little over a year (albeit, it eats up batteries), then the shutter release stopped working entirely. No damage, it just stopped working. Unfortunately, I didn't get an extended warranty. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great camera when purchased 3.5 years ago
customer_reviews.text: Great camera when purchased 3.5 years ago. However, it quickly became eclipsed by the cameras in our iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: raymond beatty

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: One of the better economical cameras I bought. Pictures are nice. It responds quickly too when the button is pressed to take a picture. Only problem is the battery door popping open if bumped around in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Veltri

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Like it not the easiest camera to use - read the instructions. It uses regular AA batteries. My only complaint is that the battery life is poor. Low light photos are fantastic and the price was right. A great value for the money, if on vacation, or if you are shooting all day make sure you have spare batteries.
customer_reviews.author: T. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very Slow.  Eats Batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this camera because it is very slow. It is especially slow after taking a picture before it is ready to take the next one. We like to travel and take pictures. Almost every time we find ourselves saying "hold it...the camera isn't ready" when we are snapping pictures. It also consumes batteries like crazy, especially when it is cold outside. I recommend having 6 extra batteries handy if you plan to take a lot of pictures in a given day. I definitely would not recommend or buy this camera again.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Deceived
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a big problem. It uses batteries too fast because the led screen, which wouldn't be a problem if it would accept rechargeable batteries. It doesn't take them because rechargeable batteries do not reach 1.5 volts when fully loaded and the camera demands such voltage. I don't have the time to exchange for something better. Never more Nikon. I've wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Well satisfied with this
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a non-technical person. While it can do many things, it also works well as just a point and shoot. Well satisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: DLNH

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and takes quality pictures. Like other reviews stated, it does go through batteries. This is not a big deal as it takes AA size batteries and so I purchased some rechargables and a charger in a big box store for less than $20.
customer_reviews.author: DSheCatawba

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Controls and menus are easy to use. Good features and nice display screen. My DSLR probably won't get much use now since this is so handy and takes great photos with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Del L. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Batteries get "exhausted" rather quickly!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are fine and operating the camera straight forward, but the batteries wear out with the expression "batteries are exhausted." Does this mean if they rest, they will work again?!? Had I realized the battery was not rechargeable, I may have selected another model.
customer_reviews.author: cinderolla

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff... Functions as it should so far. Price reasonable. Negatives... Doesn't come with case; No plug-in recharge (uses regular AA batteries); No screen protectors; and no memory card. You have to buy all this extra. A good camera.
customer_reviews.author: dd491231

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fairly straightforward and easy to use, and the pictures seem to be of good quality. I would not recommend this camera for a parent with active kids or someone who takes shots of moving subjects. It is really hit or miss as to how blurry the end result will be. It did do well for us on our vacation, however, and we have a tendency to be very hard on cameras, so it must be a hearty little camera. I would not have bought it, however, if I had tried it out first.
customer_reviews.author: slbcnv

customer_reviews.title: Great Used Camera
customer_reviews.text: My son broke my Coolpix L610, 2 months after i bought it from bestbuy brand new. I found this camera here online Honestly I will look here for a used camera before i go to bestbuy again. My used Camera is like Brand new. Excellent quality pictures, camera in great shape. All functions work. Honestly i did not just get a used camera, i got an outlet for my artistry
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Troupe

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous camera!!
customer_reviews.text: The clarity and color are amazing for a camera at this price point. The video is amazing as well. We couldn't be happier with this camera! We do recommend the lithium batteries that have to be purchased separately,
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix L610 Camera
customer_reviews.text: I chose this camera because of its 14x Zoom capability. Photos I have recently taken using that zoom capability are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: I love my Nikon Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nikon Coolpix. It takes great photos in low light and has a powerful zoom. I only wish it were smaller and lighter, but you can't have it all.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Man this sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was shopping carefully and could hardly go wrong with a Nikon, but I seem to have been mistaken. Almost every picture I have taken with it turns out to be blurry! The only thing I do really like about it is the macro lens that lets me take extreme close-ups. I know 2 people who own the Nikon model that is one or two years older than this, and theirs take great pics! I am very disappointed. In fact, I'm planning on returning it if I still can.
customer_reviews.author: tracy feri

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband. He loved it and has had nothing but good things to say about it since Christmas morning. The pictures really are beautiful. Plus it is a cool looking camera.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter for Christmas. It is a really nice camera, takes great pictures, and looks and feels nice. I would like one for myself. :)
customer_reviews.author: Goldielocks512

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera for a point and shoot. Pictures are very clear. Not even a year old and the cover holding the batteries broke.
customer_reviews.author: C. SINN

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: It works great, and the macro function is excellent. Took it on many trips as a primary camera, and the photo quality is excellent. The resolution is great. It's a little hard on standard alkaline AA batteries, so I'll be getting some of the Lithium Ion AA rechargeables.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Camera for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: What better Christmas present for my wife? She has challenged me to a competitive photo shoot of some arbitrary subject or area. After she gets this camera, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Pete F,

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bride, and she loves it, especially the 3D feature. True, you'll need a pocket full of extra batteries when you go for a shoot, but just take them. The camera works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Pipkin

customer_reviews.title: Really fast and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: It really exceeded my expectations. Really fast and easy to operate. Good picture quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, but somewhat slow battery recovery after using flash
customer_reviews.text: Takes several seconds for batteries to recover after using flash. Otherwise, a great camera. Very fast turn on for instant use.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Read

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Fits easily into jacket pocket and takes great pictures. "photo-shop" software that came with the camera is excellent for detailed clean up and enhancement of photos.
customer_reviews.author: JFB

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable quality in a small camera
customer_reviews.text: I generally use it as a point and shoot. Great quality photos. But the camera gives the option of more specific adjustments, such as night time, action, closeup, panorama, etc. Have only had for a month so am still getting a feel for its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this camera. It was a new camera but an older model. The camera was returned because it was defective and I lost patience with Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Takes good photos
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Takes good photos. Uses tons of batteries on clearest setting. Must check on re-chargeables batteries. Arrived quickly and in goof condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Wow the pixels are great. The zoom allows you to take beautiful pictures. It took a little while to figure out how to view my pictures, but I love this camera
customer_reviews.author: TONI FERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Camera was just as described. Came with everything needed to start taking pictures. I like that it takes regular batteries, you can always keep a supply of fresh batteries on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Reid

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: lens would not fully open or close, had to return
customer_reviews.author: john petlow

customer_reviews.title: takes great pictures
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and very functional. Great quality for the price. The pictures look great. Much faster than our old camera- we can actually catch what's going on!
customer_reviews.author: Seana

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera fits perfect for one hand point and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera fits perfect for one hand point and shoot. It takes great pictures for close up shots.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul

customer_reviews.title: Great New Digital Nikon Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera. It's very easy to use and takes great pictures. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a new digital camera
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Nikon cool pix
customer_reviews.text: The camera is way beyond my expatitions for a point and shoot. It is very simple to operate and fits my dry bag in the boat. Has features many high dollar cameras do not have.
customer_reviews.author: fish247

customer_reviews.title: CHEEZE
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, takes outstanding pics and the price was right. Add a Square Trade Extended Warranty and start taking photos.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality in Great and Usable. The Zoom with this camera is great best among the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Gunjan S.

customer_reviews.title: very good I am enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: very good I am enjoying it... (it is a bit bulky for a pocket camera ,(so it's not ) but it's okay...)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a birthday gift for my grown daughter. She loves it and has made numerous, beautiful photographs with it. I am tempted to buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie H

customer_reviews.title: The best little camera
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have to try some night and action shots. Then ask me. But for ordinary pictures, it performs better than others that I've had, like the Sony cameras.
customer_reviews.author: American consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures,it is better than any small camera I've ever had,I plan on taking it on all my trs to get great memories of my trips.
customer_reviews.author: Betty's special orders

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great with a good quality and it's small for travel and recomended to my sons and my family
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Resendiz Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great except for.....
customer_reviews.text: I really like the camera except for two issues, I goes through batteries pretty fast. I'm shooting outside in the winter and hopefully it will be better in warmer weather. The other thing is I really miss a view finder, I didn't think I would but now I'm sorry I bought a camera without one.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Wrong temd but functionally similar.
customer_reviews.text: Different Model No. and color than what was ordered and what I received; as the color isn't important to me and the camera is similar to what I want I will will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow in taking pictures, video is slow
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera that would take quick photos and this one does not. The video taking when down loaded is slow. This does not have a rechargeable battery either, something I would have liked, but did not check before buying. Not really impressed with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Shibley

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: The picure quality is very good for a low price camera. A good camera for a point and shoot, very light.
customer_reviews.author: creole

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Worked great on moving boat as well as inside museum. Highly recommended and so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! My son recommended it to me and he was right! It is so easy to use and takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: andrea fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great photos and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a second camera for my wife when she doesn't carry the digital SLR and it has become her every time camera
customer_reviews.author: solar-glass

customer_reviews.title: Not good for families
customer_reviews.text: This camera only uses regular batteries that drain very quickly and its slow. By the time it takes the picture our 17 month old has already moved. We bought this take capture her life but all we are getting is blur. Wish we would've spent more money the first time so we aren't stuck shopping for another camera already.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Russ

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good camera for the price. So far the pictures look good. Fits well in hand and pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Software (NikonView NX2) will not download to my computer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera at a very good price (129.00) from Amazon. It does everything I could expect, but the software (NikonView NX2) refuses to downlOad to my Microsoft Windows 7 computer. I have communicated daily for over a week with Nikon Customer Support in an attempt to resolve this matter, because if you can't download pictures, what good is it? Maybe I'll have to resort to a card reader or get a different camera.
customer_reviews.author: DWIGHT T. WALKER

customer_reviews.title: short battery life
customer_reviews.text: The camera was a little heavier than I expected. There is a delay in almost all functions. The battery life lasted 2 days while we were on vacation in Europe. We had to replace the batteries every two days. I would not recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Minou C.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for a novice. It finds faces in the viewing area and zooms in and out quickly. Display is very clear. Buy a large memory card as you will want to take lots of photos.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: The price was ok and this nikon camera has the portability + some really cool setting to take nice pictures.
customer_reviews.author: M. Espinar

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix L610
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera! I love being able to take clear close and distant pictures. Easy to use, small and fits in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, great price, really nice pictures..better than I expected. Fits in my jacket's pocket unlike my 2 other bulky DSLR cameras. For weekend travels, I take this one with me. I'll take it with me as a backup for my Nikon DSLR on foreign country travels.
customer_reviews.author: Rey G.

customer_reviews.title: Keep lithium batteries on hand!
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, gave it as a present; Christmas you know, I hope you got one for Christmas 2012 too !
customer_reviews.author: Jarl MacSalt

customer_reviews.title: Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Arrived really fast in a decent pack. I must confess and admit that the batteries run out quite soon. By the way makes outstanding pictures and video.
customer_reviews.author: Imre Kadar

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix L610 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: We love the camera. It's easy to use and the 16 megapixals make the pictures stunningly sharp. I also love the 14 powere digital zoom. I can get as close to subjects as I can with my digital SLR and 300 mm lens.
customer_reviews.author: Rawn A. Wallgren

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX L610 Digital Camera (Black) (Old Model)
feature_bullets: Optical VR image stabilization minimizes camera shake
